version_description: Version 1.5 adds the much-requested key-press feedback, and fixes an iPad bug. We're now starting work on version 2.0, which will be a major upgrade re-coded from scratch with an auto-complete bar and even quicker access to numbers, symbols, and more. For updates on our progress, join our email list at herokeyboard.com.

HERO v2.0 is completely re-coded from scratch for better typing action. Basic typing is free! Subscribe for just $0.99/month for more themes and the full emoji, number, and symbol views. New features are:
- An auto-complete bar.
- Tilt iPhone 6/6+ or iPad to slide the keyboard toward your thumb for easy 1-thumb typing.
- Tap the center bolt to enter a SPACE. Hold or 3D-Touch the bolt then drag for quick access to numbers, symbols, emojis, and cursor control.
- Smarter emoji categories (for subscribers)
- There's no drag-to-type (yet!)

I hope you like it -- please post your suggestions on the new HERO User Group (linked from the app).
Thanks!
Corey

Version 2.1 has:
- A "SpeedTest" tab, where you can do 1-minute tests of your typing speed on HERO and QWERTY.
- Two new themes: Rose Gold, and Superclean White. (You can always suggest new themes on the HERO Users Facebook Group!)
- Better Autosuggest and Autocomplete.

Thanks for supporting HERO!

- All features are now unlocked!
- No more subscription model for themes (current subscribers: see support.herokeyboard.com for how to convert your subscription free)
- An optional "Zoomed" view if you want the keyboard to fill the entire width on iPhone 6, 7, and Plus.
- Fixed an iPad Pro bug, and some other ones I won't bore you with.

- It works on iPhone X!
- Added arrow buttons to move the keyboard for 1-thumb typing
- Brought back the setting to show only uppercase keys
- Fixed an auto-capitalization bug
